titles.title: Relating to the tariff treatment of Benthiocarb.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Executive Comment Requested from Treasury, Commerce, ITC, USTR.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 7/21/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to provide a duty on s-(4-chlorobenzyl)-N,N-diethyl-thiolcarbamate (also known as Benthiocarb).
